title: Order Tracking FAQ
text: Use your tracking ID from the confirmation email to monitor your PakShip package at www.pakship.com/track. Updates are available 24/7.

title: Refund Processing Time
text: Refunds for approved claims are processed within 5-7 business days to your original payment method. Check status in your account.

title: COD Payment Options
text: Pay via cash or mobile apps like EasyPaisa at delivery. COD fee is PKR 100 for orders under PKR 20,000.

title: Delivery Delays Policy
text: Delays beyond 7 days qualify for a PKR 50 credit. Contact support@pakship.com with your order ID to claim.

title: Restricted Items List
text: Prohibited items include liquids, batteries, and sharp objects. Full list at www.pakship.com/restrictions.
